content.title: Day 3 Log
content.body:
It's been three days since the outbreak started, and a quarter of the village has already turned. I feel like I'm next...
I've been gathering supplies from everyone's house, but some still remain. I can't carry everything, but I plan to go back soon.
Here's hoping someone else survived.
I'll need help to construct a proper quaratine dome, and although I could do it alone it'd go much faster if I had help.
